Articles.Content: Felsmak is in the process of creating an animation video featuring Bob Kerman called “Great Naked Man Space”. There’s not much known about the video, but the artwork alone is definitely worth a mention in itself. Head over to the [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/125239-Great-Naked-Man-Space](<a%20href=)">**forum thread** for updates!

From the thread (because no pics, no clicks, right?)

![yZN59Au.png](http://i.imgur.com/yZN59Au.png)

![sPeGLJL.png](http://i.imgur.com/sPeGLJL.png)

![d10Ssjq.png](http://i.imgur.com/d10Ssjq.png)

This is incredible stuff... I'm so happy it got featured for a Fanwork Friday. Congrants Felsmak!
Really beautiful stuff. I'm really looking forward to seeing that video.
Some sort of Interstellar parody? That last pic...

Dear Most Talented and Creative Movie Director Felsmak,

We, your most ardent fans at Voidryder's Aerospace, salute your cinematic choice of our Chief Kerbalnaut Bob Kerman as your film's hero. Bravery is overcoming great fear and doing what is necessary. One only has to observe Chief Kerbalnaut Bob Kerman's facial expressions and screams during any flight to see he is overcoming great fear. In fact, Bob's facial expressions have proven a better indicator of less than nominal performance of our launch vehicles and spacecraft than any cockpit instrumentation. (A true cost saving!)

Our only request is that you schedule any necessary filming around Chief Kerbalnaut Bob Kerman's upcoming planned landing on Eve. Seriously, we feel it is wise to do so as the return vehicle is still under design.

Sincerely,

The Grand Designer

Voidryder's Aerospace

P.S. Our Attorneys will be in contact over royalties percentages.

> 
> Some sort of Interstellar parody? That last pic...

Hae you seen his Interstellar parody? Not sure this one is one, but he has made one before.

> 
> Hae you seen his Interstellar parody? Not sure this one is one, but he has made one before.

Umm, no. Felsmak's vids are way to weird for me.

Yay, this stuff!

But seriously, good job Felsmak; this is all awesome!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-27T02:46:15Z" title="06/27/2015 02:46  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 27, 2015</time> by RAINCRAFTER**
So, it's Great Naked Space Man, but animated?

And here is the finished video!

Wow...... I'm...... amazed that anyone on this forum could be so stu...errrr...gifted.

Its a great video... if I ever watch that movie again, I'll be LOLing at that scene.... ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
